document.full_text: france's intelligence services have unearthed a case of suspected industrial espionage at an engine subsidiary of french aerospace and defense firm safran, le monde newspaper said in its weekend edition.
document.title: french probe espionage at defense firm unit: report
lines_and_colors: france's intelligence services have unearthed a case of suspected industrial espionage at an engine subsidiary of french aerospace and defense firm safran, le monde newspaper said in its weekend edition.
